CategoryEdit.noSitesInCategory: No sites in this category, click "Add site" to start adding

CategoryEdit.invalidClassFormat: Invalid format, please use "prefix icon-name" format
CategoryEdit.restoreChangesMessage: This action will discard all unsaved changes and restore to the last saved state. Are you sure you want to continue?

CategoryEdit.deleteSiteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the site "{siteName}"? This action cannot be undone.

SiteEdit.noAssociatedUrls: No associated URLs, you can add them in the form below

SiteEdit.pleaseEnterValidUrl: Please enter a valid URL (must start with http:// or https://)

SiteEdit.restoreChangesMessage: This operation will discard all unsaved changes and restore to the last saved state. Are you sure you want to continue?
